meta.title: About iSperm Medical | CASA System Manufacturer
meta.description: Leading CASA system & semen analyzer manufacturer. WHO 6th edition compliant sperm morphology analyzers for human & veterinary use since 2010.

hero.title: Who We Are
hero.subtitle: Leading the Global Standard in CASA Technology

description.text: iSperm Medical is a global innovator dedicated to advanced, efficient, and accessible reproductive diagnostics. By combining AI-driven algorithms with microfluidics, we deliver laboratory-grade precision to professionals worldwide. Our mission is to redefine reproductive assessment through fully automated CASA system and sperm quality analyzer technology.

education.title: Education
education.item1: B.Eng. in Mechatronics, Nanjing Univ. of Aeronautics & Astronautics
education.item2: M.Eng. in Biomedical Engineering (Microfluidics), UNSW, Australia

career.title: Career
career.item1: Early work in aviation manufacturing and micro/nano etching
career.item2: Joined Mindray, developed China's first 5-part hematology analyzer
career.item3: Led microfluidics R&D at a CAS-affiliated chip company

entrepreneurship.title: Entrepreneurship
entrepreneurship.item1: Founded Create&Care (2016), focused on microfluidic chip industrialization
entrepreneurship.item2: Launched Bemaner(SQA-900), a portable AI semen analyzer (iF & Red Dot award); 100K+ users; validated by NUL (PMC7714652)
entrepreneurship.item3: Expanded tech to primary care, home diagnostics, and veterinary use

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.item1: National "10,000 Talents Plan" expert; Shenzhen High-Level Talent
achievements.item2: Awards: China Youth Innovation Gold Award, Medical Device Innovation Award
achievements.item3: 30+ global patents; dubbed "Inventor of Cell-Level Microfluidic Chips"

research.title: Research
research.intro: In 2020, Benjamin published a study on AI-based sperm analysis. See the article:
research.linkText: Web- and Artificial Intelligence-Based Image Recognition For Sperm Motility Analysis (Verification Study)
